game.name: Cooking Delicious Chicken Pasta
game.description:
Cooking Delicious Chicken Pasta is a brand new free online game designed to help girls to have fun in unlimited amount. In this awesome cooking game for girls, you will have to prove your chef skills by preparing a highly delicious chicken pasta meal. Make sure that you look into all the needful kitchen tools and ingredients to get your job done timely. Mix the ingredients and boil the pasta properly in order to cook a scrumptious meal. Also prepare tasty sauce to complete the recipe. 

You are always suggested to use some parsley, parmesan and ketchup to finish off the dish. Put your best to prepare some mouth-watering spaghetti with chicken mean. Although cooking this recipe is not easy as you thought of, following the instructions with an open mind can help get through all the obstacles and complete the mission of the game successfully. Use the mouse to play this cool girls kitchen game in your browser. 

Use a cooker with water to boil the spaghetti. Meanwhile, follow the recipe to prepare the meat on time. Slice the chicken meat in small pieces and then get ready to cook it on the pan. Combine the ingredients to prepare a tasty sauce and then mix it up with the chicken meat to make the recipe lip-smacking. Once the task of boiling of spaghetti is done, mix it up with the chicken and the sauce. Congratulations! Your dish is ready to serve now kids! All the girls to blast today!
